name: Networking and connectivity
description: Choose how clients reach APIM and how APIM reaches backends.

topics.name: Inbound
notes: Public endpoint: simplest, can be protected with auth + IP filtering + WAF in front if required.
Private access: requires network and DNS planning; validate how consumers will connect.

topics.name: Outbound to backends
notes: Confirm backend is reachable from the gateway path (public internet, private network, or self-hosted gateway).
If using private backends, define routing and name resolution early.

nextSteps: Document inbound/outbound paths and DNS requirements.
Select a SKU that supports required networking capabilities (for example, VNet-related requirements).
